page.title: 04THORNHILL NORRIESTON FARM
page.content: This farm is a large dairy farm. 110 British Friesian cows are milked twice daily through a 16/16 Fullwood Milking Parlour.Milk is sold off the farm at 16p per litre.(In the shops this costs us 43p).Much of the 165 acres of this farm is in grass for grazing this herd of cows and the young bulls and heifers and for silage.Crops grown are spring barley,winter wheat,winter barley and hay.Three tractors are kept,one combine harvester and various other types of machinery for cultivation. There is also 1 forklift and a baler. None of the farms around here have working horses but a few keep a Clydesdale or two,mainly for pleasure.
